name: Iberostar Laguna Azul

reviews.text: After travelling for many years with an extended family, this was our first time with just our "little" family. We had lower expectations of Cuba based on past experiences but were totally blown away by this resort. The staff were friendly and helpful. The room was spacious and clean. We had adjoining rooms with our oldest children. The only complaint was that there was no cot available for our yougest so we had to rig up a bed for him on the bench- type sofa. Cribs were available for babies. Next time I would bring a portable side rail. Our ninja teenager loved the open air rooftop yoga/ tai-chi/ martial arts area. All our kids loved the ice cream stand and the kids shows - monkeys and clowns anyone? The Japenese restaurant was bizarre, cream cheese sushi and miso soup that appeared to be chicken broth with cubes of cheese, not tofu. Otherwise the food was fine with enough choices. Wine was terrible. A smart group from BC brought their own! The test of a good resort is how they handle problems. I became very ill on my last day. On our request, the front desk arranged for late check out and found a van to take us to the airport so I could sleep. They were solicitous and kind. I would return. The resort is mobility friendly with ramps to a boardwalk overlooking the beach.
reviews.title: Would return again

reviews.text: This 5 star hotel is awesome.! The staff are friendly,the food is realy good...if you are a "picky eater or looking for things to complain about, than you will find something I'm sure but if you are willing to try new things and relax, it's no problem for sure. The a la carte restaurants are super...recommend the steak people!.and the snapper fish is really good to. The pools are clean,lots of sun chairs, the beach is really nice...seaweed there but it is the ocean!! The Star Friends are friendly and nice. Always giving you flowers and nice compliments. The rooms are clean...maid didn't always remember towels and facecloths but if you don't mind asking for things..it's fine. If you are looking for trouble, well I guess you'll find it anywhere. The only real problem is trying to make international calls...it can't be done...no international phone service ! But we improvised...we bought internet phone cards, and e-mails messages....always ways around things if you're smart!
reviews.title: excellent holiday

reviews.text: Where to start...first off, before booking like you I had come to this site to check the reviews and they were mostly all good. it sounded great. Well, I have no idea what they were all talking about?
reviews.title: Definatley not a 5 star...not even by Cuba standards. I don't know what these people are talking about?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you like the kind of relaxing beautiful trip where you book into a 5 star and expect to be treated like a rock star then don't stay here. There is nothing luxury about this place. I know it's Cuba and you are supposd to lower your standards but, I felt like I was camping all week and I will never return. Let me explain...
reviews.title: iberostar laguna azul EvilQTips Review Very Good!

reviews.text: We arrive and the hotel looks very nice from the street. Inside the Lobby is mass chaios. Looking around ALL the seats had huge stains on them and when you sat down there was no padding left. Combined with the 80"s decor I looked around and thought gross, and they say this hotel is only 1 year old...yeah right!
reviews.title: Beautiful resort, amazing people, food was alright but not a big deal

reviews.text: Amazing 5 stars hotel . We were 5 girls and had a lot of fun !
reviews.title: Best Animation Ever !!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food was very good, this hotel is beautiful , the pool is very big and clean !
reviews.title: Beautiful resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: And the stars friends are very gorgeous sexy and nice !
reviews.title: value for money

reviews.text: Go talk to Michael, Daniel, Yossuan they are the best entertainers and will refer you to wich disco to go !
reviews.title: Honeymoon with teenagers

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The shows at night are very good to.
reviews.title: Beautiful Resort

reviews.text: My girlfriends and I have been planning this trip forever and we had a fantastic time despite the hurricane that greeted us. When we got there the hotel looked fabulous, very safe and beautiful. Staff was friendly. We were starved from our trip, the food was at the tail end of lunch so it was not very good but our expectation for food in Cuba was not very high to begin with. We wanted to have fun and relax. Our room was okay but had that damp feeling the whole time but at least the air condition worked the whole time we were there, mind you the weather in October was very comfortable, not too hot and not too cold. The beach was nice. Always had a spot for us 5 under a palalpa. And then it rained. But the staff's spirit was up and made all their guests feel comfortable. The Bahama Mama's helped....yummy!!! It rained all night but the next day was beautiful blue skies and hot sun. The pool area is clean and the entertainment staff has some good eye candy (for the women)!! Don't worry boys...plenty of eye candy for you too!!! We only stayed for 4 days but it was the best time!! Overall the hotel's service was very good. Our toilet was malfunctioning at 1:30 in the morning and someone came to fix it in half an hour. The waiters and waitresses were very friendly and our maid was very accomodating. So the if you don't have high expectations for the food you will not be disappointed but the entertainment and relaxation part of the trip was tops!!! The food was not that bad, the buffet always had variety. My girlfirends and I had a fantastic time!!
reviews.title: Fantastic trip despite Hurricane Paula

reviews.text: This was my first and DEFINITELY NOT the last trip to Varadero Cuba. Just got back from a week with the five girls including my 81 year old mother and had a BALL!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.title: CUBA, YOU HAVE REALLY STOLEN A PIECE OF MY HEART"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Other than a small problem with the faucet knob to put on the shower EVERYTHING was great!!!!!!!!!! Yes, the food was not "like home" but the variety was ENORMOUS and very tasty. Hotel grounds were beautiful and staff very accommodating especially Alexis one of the activity staff that did "morning strecthing classes" on the beach everyday.....what a real treat. The beach bar boys "Yiesel and Yariel" YOU WERE AWESOME!!!!!!!!!! Overall for the price and the place you can't beat Cuba.......I am already counting the days til my return.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay at Laguna Azul... great service, accommodation and food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for two weeks at the Laguna Azul hotel, and, it being our first time doing an all-inclusive deal, we were very impressed with the hotel, the staff, the food, the amenities etc. I wouldn't pay too much attention to the bad reviews on this site - unless you're used to extreme decadence, this hotel will tick all boxes. The beach is no more than three minutes' walk from your hotel room; the staff are unfailing in their helpfulness; there is a selection of food available what seems like around the clock; the accommodation is clean, comfortable and quiet. Our cleaner would make the most amazing "animals" out of our towels, bedclothes etc., and we arrived back to the room one day to find a bath had been drawn for us, with flower petals strewn around. I would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel to people who are looking for a relaxing, easy holiday.
reviews.title: An Honest (Long) Review From a Wary Traveller ...

reviews.text: My husband and I just returned from Iberostar Laguna Azul where we celebrated our honeymoon. After reading all the reviews, I was a little hesitant to go and did not know what to expect. I thought we would come home starving, sick and sad. Turns out, this was the furthest from the truth as we could get. Read on for more info ....
reviews.title: This hotel is a total nightmare!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Checkin: A bit disorganized and a long lineup with minimal staff to check in at 11am
reviews.title: Iberostart Laguna Azul - Varadero

reviews.text: Accommodation: New building. Excellent design. Most rooms have both an ocean view and pool view. Buidings connected in case of inclement weather. Rooms large with comfortable bedding. Bathroom in good working order. Efficient maid service. Lobby furnishings are unusually worn for the age of the resort, and as others have posted cushions have mold. People are likely sitting on furniture with wet bathingsuits and the furniture has not be replaced. Towel service experienced to be slow.
reviews.title: Paradise--but lost my camera at the hotel lobby

description: Located on a beautiful stretch of Varadero's Beach. Approximately 160 km from Havana and 20 min. from downtown Varadero. 814 rooms allocated in different buildings, 24 are suites and 8 are for handicapped. Reception 24 hrs. open, currency exchange, internet 24 hrs. Buffet restaurant with show cooking and 4 a la carte restaurants and Ranchón near the beach. Lobby bar, Cigar bar, aqua-bar, and 2 snacks bars at the pool. Conference rooms, SPA, gym, and beauty salon, 2 tennis and paddle court. Ice cream saloon, animation theatre and disco. 5 outdoor swimming pools. Miniclub (4-12 years).
